title: How to Remove Grime from Wood Panels with Olive Oil

steps.headline: Make up a cleaning mixture.
steps.description: Combine a half cup of olive oil with a half cup of vinegar and mix well. Add 2 cups of lukewarm water to the emulsion.

steps.headline: Dip a soft cleaning cloth into the emulsion.
Rub the cleaning mixture over the wood panels.
steps.description: You may need to rub vigorously over any built-up grime but, for the most part, the rubbing motion should be gentle and easy.

steps.headline: Rub off with a clean, dry soft cloth.
steps.description: The panels should come up looking as good as new.

text: Make up a cleaning mixture. Combine a half cup of olive oil with a half cup of vinegar and mix well. Add 2 cups of lukewarm water to the emulsion. Dip a soft cleaning cloth into the emulsion.  Rub the cleaning mixture over the wood panels. You may need to rub vigorously over any built-up grime but, for the most part, the rubbing motion should be gentle and easy. Leave for a minute.  Rub off with a clean, dry soft cloth. The panels should come up looking as good as new.
